shower gels.title: NIVEA MEN 3in1 Shower Gel Body Wash, Power Fresh 24h Fresh Effect Citrus Scent, 250ml
aboutThisItem: 3-IN-1 MULTIUSE FORMULA: Ideal for body, hair, and face care.
EFFECTIVE CLEANSING: Leaves skin feeling clean, revitalized, and energized.
COOLING FRESHNESS: Infused with menthol and mint for a long-lasting, refreshing scent with a masculine touch.
GENTLE ON SKIN: pH-balanced and dermatologically approved for skin compatibility.

shower gels.title: JOHNSON’S Body Wash - Vita-Rich, Smoothies, Indulging, Yogurt, Peach & Coconut, 250ml
aboutThisItem: Designed to provide lasting comfort for up to 48 hours
Delicately scented with a sweet, fruity aroma
Infused with nourishing yogurt, peach, and coconut extracts

shower gels.title: NIVEA Shower Gel Body Wash, Fresh Powerfruit Antioxidants Blueberry Scent, 250ml
aboutThisItem: INVIGORATING shower gel that lathers richly to leave skin feeling refreshed.
INFUSED WITH antioxidants and a vibrant blueberry scent.
IQ HYDRA TECHNOLOGY delivers lasting moisture, even after towel drying.
Eco-friendly: 98% biodegradable formula, microplastic-free, and packaged in a bottle made with 96% recycled plastic (excluding cap).

shower gels.title: Lux Perfumed Shower Gel Romantic Hibiscus for 24 Hours Long Lasting Fragrance 500ML
aboutThisItem: 24-HOUR LASTING SCENT – Lux Body Wash wraps you in a captivating fragrance that lingers all day.
Experience irresistibly soft, beautifully scented skin for up to 24 hours after each shower.
This luxurious body wash transforms your routine with its rich, indulgent aroma.
Infused with Everscent Essential Oils, it delivers a fine fragrance while gently caring for your skin.
